divs: sighting detailssusann was driving up state road 658 towards turberville va. she was about fivemiles north-west from home when she saw a pyramid-diamond shaped object in thesky. it was very shiney and reflecting a lot of sun light, that is what madeher first noticed it. she at first thought it was a plane but noticed it wasnot moving and could not see any wings. she next pulled off of the road towatch it. she estimates it was about 1000 feet high at a distance of 3\4 of amile over a wooded area. it never moved just stayed in one place and made nosound. she said she watched it for two full minutes as it just hung there inone place. it just vanished while she was looking at it and she is sure it wasnot a blimp or a balloon, but some sort of ufo. after it vanished she droveoff.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Alton
There were no other sightings in Alton on or around October 25th 2001
